home.name: Tomas Sanchez
home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.description: Specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences. Currently focused on developing interactive and innovative web applications, both on the server and client side.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient digital solutions.
about.description2: Specialized in developing modern web applications with technologies like React, Vue.js, Next.js and Node.js. I focus on writing clean, scalable code and creating exceptional user experiences.
about.description3: With experience in software architecture, performance optimization, and collaborative work in agile teams. I constantly seek to learn new technologies and apply best practices to deliver high-quality products.

bullets: Developed and maintained a complete stock and sales management system with artificial intelligence integration, improving operational efficiency by over 40%
Implemented integrations with third-party APIs (AFIP, Mercado Pago, OpenAI) using Vue.js and TypeScript, reducing transaction processing time by 35%
Optimized database processes with MongoDB, achieving a 50% reduction in query times through strategic indexes and efficient queries
Collaborated on scalable architecture design with Tailwind CSS for responsive interfaces, improving user experience on mobile and desktop devices
Automated sales reports and analytics, enabling users to generate real-time reports and make data-driven decisions
Developed web and mobile applications for multiple clients using Next.js and TypeScript, meeting tight deadlines and quality standards
Implemented solutions with Firebase for authentication, storage, and real-time databases, improving development speed by 30%
Integrated geolocation APIs for map and location features, improving accuracy of location-based services for end users
Worked in teams using agile methodologies, participating in weekly sprints and code reviews that improved code quality by 25%
Optimized application performance through lazy loading, code splitting, and image optimization, reducing initial load times by 45%
